title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 263.85 - Agreement to arbitrate
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 263.85 - Agreement to arbitrate

State Regulations

Either party or both parties to a written agreement may
request the director of conciliation to commence the administration of these
voluntary arbitration rules of procedure if, in their agreement, the parties
have provided for arbitration. The voluntary arbitration rules of procedure
shall apply in the form in effect at the time the arbitration is
initiated. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12

263.85

Adopted

New

York State Register February 15, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 07, eff. 2/15/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
